mapper.sql: ID, MAINID, ZJQDID, FJZCH, BJLX, JH, XLH, DJXMID, DJBH, ZWMS, JKFLBH, JKLBH, JK_SZ, JK_DW, WHSJ, ZT, DPRTCODE
mapper.select:
select b1.mainid, b1.jkflbh, b1.dprtcode, b1.jklbh, b1.fjzch, b3.ms, case b1.jklbh when 'calendar' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when 'fuselage_flight_time' then (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_xs END) || ':' ||(CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_fz END) when 'search_light_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_fz END) when 'winch_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_fz END) when 'landing_gear_cycle' then b6.qljxh || '' when 'winch_cycle' then b5.jcxh || '' when 'ext_suspension_loop' then b5.dgxh || '' when 'special_first' then b6.ts1 || '' when 'special_second' then b6.ts2 || '' when 'N1' then b5.fdj_n1 || '' when 'N2' then b5.fdj_n2 || '' when 'N3' then b5.fdj_n3 || '' when 'N4' then b5.fdj_n4 || '' when 'N5' then b5.fdj_n5 || '' when 'N6' then b5.fdj_n6 || '' else '0' end sj, b7.dw from b_s_00304 b1 join b_s_00303 b2 on b1.mainid = b2.id join d_00601 b3 on b1.jkflbh = b3.jkflbh and b1.jklbh = b3.jklbh left join (select t1.fjzch, t1.jh, t1.xlh, t1.dprtcode, case t1.cj when 2 then t2.jh when 1 then t1.jh else t1.jh end fjdjh, case t1.cj when 2 then t2.xlh when 1 then t1.xlh else t1.xlh end fjdxlh, t1.cj from b_s_003 t1 left join b_s_003 t2 on t2.id = t1.fjdid where t1.zt = 1 and t1.sxzt = 1 ) b4 on b2.fjzch = b4.fjzch and b2.jh = b4.jh and b2.xlh = b4.xlh and b2.dprtcode = b4.dprtcode left join (select jh, xlh, dprtcode, sum(fxsj_xs) fxsj_xs, sum(fxsj_fz) fxsj_fz, sum(fsj_xs) fsj_xs, sum(fsj_fz) fsj_fz, sum(qljxh) qljxh, sum(jcsj_xs) jcsj_xs, sum(jcsj_fz) jcsj_fz, sum(jcxh) jcxh, sum(fdj_n1) fdj_n1, sum(fdj_n2) fdj_n2, sum(fdj_n3) fdj_n3, sum(fdj_n4) fdj_n4, sum(fdj_n5) fdj_n5, sum(fdj_n6) fdj_n6, sum(ssdsj_xs) ssdsj_xs, sum(ssdsj_fz) ssdsj_fz, sum(dgxh) dgxh, sum(ts1) ts1, sum(ts2) ts2 from b_h_01001 where is_cyjs = 1 and zt = 1 and xdbs = 0 group by jh, xlh,dprtcode) b5 on b4.fjdjh = b5.jh and b4.fjdxlh = b5.xlh and b4.dprtcode = b5.dprtcode left join (select b_s_006.fjzch,b_s_006.dprtcode, sum(b_s_00601.fxsj_xs) fxsj_xs, sum(b_s_00601.fxsj_fz) fxsj_fz, sum(b_s_00601.qljxh) qljxh, sum(b_s_00601.ts1) ts1, sum(b_s_00601.ts2) ts2 from b_s_00601 join b_s_006 on b_s_006.id = b_s_00601.fxjldid and b_s_006.zt in (2, 12, 99) and b_s_00601.zt = 1 and b_s_00601.xdbs = 0 group by b_s_006.fjzch, b_s_006.dprtcode) b6 on b6.fjzch = b1.fjzch and b6.dprtcode = b1.dprtcode left join b_g_01201 b7 on b1.djxmid = b7.djxmid and b1.jklbh = b7.jklbh and b1.jkflbh = b7.jkflbh and b1.dprtcode = b7.dprtcode
order by b3.pxh asc

select b1.mainid, b1.jkflbh, b1.dprtcode, b1.jklbh, b1.fjzch,b2.csbj, b3.ms as ms, (case b4.gs_djjh when 1 then case when case when b1.jkflbh = 'calendar' then to_number(to_char(to_date(b2.jkjhz, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd')) else to_number( (CASE WHEN INSTR(b2.jkjhz, ':') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(b2.jkjhz, 0, INSTR(b2.jkjhz, ':') - 1) WHEN INSTR(b2.jkjhz, '.') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(b2.jkjhz, 0, INSTR(b2.jkjhz, '.') - 1) ELSE CASE WHEN b2.jkjhz IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE b2.jkjhz END END) || '.' || (CASE WHEN INSTR(b2.jkjhz, ':') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(b2.jkjhz, INSTR(b2.jkjhz, ':') + 1, length(b2.jkjhz)) WHEN INSTR(b2.jkjhz, '.') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(b2.jkjhz, INSTR(b2.jkjhz, '.') + 1, length(b2.jkjhz)) ELSE '0' END)) end >= case when b1.jkflbh = 'calendar' then to_number(to_char(to_date(b2.jksjz, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd')) else
to_number((CASE WHEN INSTR(b2.jksjz, ':') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(b2.jksjz, 0, INSTR(b2.jksjz, ':') - 1) WHEN INSTR(b2.jksjz, '.') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(b2.jksjz, 0, INSTR(b2.jksjz, '.') - 1) ELSE CASE WHEN b2.jkjhz IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE b2.jkjhz END END) || '.' || (CASE WHEN INSTR(b2.jksjz, ':') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(b2.jksjz, INSTR(b2.jksjz, ':') + 1, length(b2.jksjz)) WHEN INSTR(b2.jksjz, '.') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(b2.jksjz, INSTR(b2.jksjz, '.') + 1, length(b2.jksjz)) ELSE '0' END)) end then b2.jksjz else b2.jkjhz end when 2 then b2.jksjz else b2.jkjhz end) as jhz , case b2.csbj when 0 then b5.zqz else 0 end zqz, b5.zqz MONITOR_ZQZ, b5.dw as dw from b_s_00304 b1 left join b_s_008 b2 on b1.jkflbh = b2.jkflbh and b1.jklbh = b2.jklbh and b2.is_cyjs = 1 and b2.zt = 1 and b1.zjqdid = b2.zjqdid and b1.djxmid = b2.djxmid and b1.dprtcode = b2.dprtcode join d_00601 b3 on b1.jkflbh = b3.jkflbh and b1.jklbh = b3.jklbh join (select d_004.gs_djjh, d_007.fjzch, d_007.dprtcode from d_007 join d_004 on d_007.fjjx = d_004.fjjx and d_007.dprtcode=d_004.dprtcode and d_007.zt = 1 and d_004.zt = 1) b4 on b1.fjzch = b4.fjzch and b1.dprtcode = b4.dprtcode left join b_g_01201 b5 on b1.djxmid = b5.djxmid and b1.jklbh = b5.jklbh and b1.jkflbh = b5.jkflbh
order by b3.pxh asc
